channel.title: machine learning on Linro
channel.description: Recent content in machine learning on Linro

item.title: Graph Networks 学习笔记 :: [GAT, GraphSAGE, H-GCN]
item.description: 概述 在自动化所科创项目选拔中阅读的论文，留下了一些笔记。 三篇论文分别是： Graph Attention Networks Inductive Representation Learning on Large Graphs Hierarchical Graph Convolutional Networks for Semi-supervised Node Classification 分别对应了GAT，GraphSAGE和H-GCN。最后一篇，也就是H-GCN，就是组里师兄做的工作。 阅读笔记 GAT GraphSAGE H-GCN

item.title: 雏雁计划神经网络训练记录
item.description: 思路 使用前20个问题预测剩下11个问题的答案。将经常、有时、很少、从不规范化为[1, 0.33, -0.33, -1]。 训练笔记 Small ReLU 20 -> 18 -> 11 Result: acc \(65.22 \%\) test_acc \(45.45\%\) Mid Relu 20 -> 30 -> 11 Result: acc: 0.7521 test_acc: 0.4727 test_acc_l: 0.6636 Tiny Relu 20 -> 10 -> 11 Result: acc: 0.5513 test_acc: 0.5091 test_acc_l: 0.5509 Smaller Relu 20 -> 15 -> 11 Result: acc: 0.5853 test_acc: 0.5236 test_acc_l: 0.7909 Smaller Relu V2 Difference: change batch_size to 32, shuffle data.
